name: The Vengeance
description:
The Vengeance is a university project done in a group.

The Vengeance is a 2D action-adventure single-player game in a Medieval fantasy setting for windows with a companion app. In the game, the player is on an adventure and to level up and upgrade the equipment he/she must kill monsters that are around the map.

Story:

After living a normal life and dying because of monsters coming from the void with your family, you get a second chance at life coming back in time to when you just turned 18. In your second life, your goal is to get vengeance on the monsters that killed you and your family.
